content: if you re after a quick cute project that feels a little bit valentine-y without being fussy this heart dishcloth knitting pattern is it the heart design is made using only knit and purl stitches so it s a confidence-boosting way to practice texture while making something genuinely useful these dishcloths or washcloths also make a sweet handmade gift especially when tied up with a ribbon and a nice soap yarn any cotton yarn 100% cotton works best for absorbent cloths around 30g/51 meters/55 8 yds knitting needles 4mm / us 6 knitting needles sizing 10 x 10 in / 25 x 25 cm depending on your yarn and gauge skill level basic - beginner you only need to know how to cast on knit purl and cast off the hearts are created with knit and purl texture no increases decreases or fancy stitches
